testcase.brief: For every one minute interval, AP will monitor the interference channel utilizations and send trap to HM
testcase.description: Description: For every one minute interval, AP will monitor the interference channel utilizations and send trap to HM Pre-condition: AP connect to HM Create the following config: interface wifi0 radio adaptive-cca enable interface wifi0 radio adaptive-cca default-cca 15 interface wifi0 radio adaptive-cca max-cca 15 radio profile xx radio profile xx phymode 11ng radio profile xx interference-map enable radio profile xx interference-map cu-threshold 15 interface wifi0 radio profile xx ssid testsnmp hive zz interface wifi0 radio profile xx interface mgt0 hive zz interface wifi0 ssid testsnmp Test procedure: 1.Open _debug capwap trap and debug console to check if trap be generated and sent out 2.Check if interference channel utilizations trap be sent to HM(or use test command “_test trap-case info interferencealert” to generate trap) Expect result: Trap be sent to HM

step.log-match: -e "RUN state: Connected securely to the CAPWAP server" -c

step.desc: Open _debug capwap trap to check trap in AP1
Use test command to generate interference alert trap
Show log buffered to check interference alert trap be generated and be sent to HM
